name: DiwaliFirecrackers
0:
”Alexa, open diwali firecrackers”
”Alexa, ask diwali firecrackers to start diwali celebrations”
”Alexa, ask diwali firecrackers to give me some diwali sounds”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: diwali firecrackers
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Diwali away from home? Or even worse, first Diwali away from home? Miss no longer; reminisce the essence of Diwali with 20 different Diwali sounds and more than 30 different Diwali greetings that will take you right back home with light, warmth and some tasty sweets. 

🎆🎆🎆🎇🎇🎇

You can say things like: 

Alexa, ask diwali firecrackers to light a dia
Alexa, ask diwali firecrackers to play fireworks sound
Alexa, ask diwali firecrackers to make some fireworks please
Alexa, ask diwali firecrackers to give me a diwali dhamaka
Alexa, ask diwali firecrackers for some diwali greeting
Alexa, ask diwali firecrackers to give me some diwali sounds
Alexa, tell diwali firecrackers that I want to hear the sound of a cracker burst
Alexa, tell diwali firecrackers that I want to hear a greeting
Alexa, ask diwali firecrackers to light some patakha please
Alexa, ask diwali firecrackers to start diwali celebrations

Support 💚Green Diwali💚 and do your part for the environment by not bursting firecrackers.

We continue adding more sounds and features to our skill to make it better. Please rate our skill on the Skill Store to tell us how you like Diwali Firecrackers and help us continue making it better.
priv:
